title: SHAKE_CAM
content:
0x6A25241C340D38220x1D4211B0// ShakeCam
void SHAKE_CAM(Cam cam, char* shakeName, float intensity);Parameters:cam: The camera handle.shakeName: The name of the shake.intensity: The intensity of the shake.See SHAKE_GAMEPLAY_CAM for a full list of camera shakes.
